isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS INTERNATIONAL MODEL ES52-7A AND ESO65-7A 6-PLUS - LUBRICATION

svcsubsecinfo.para: To insure proper lubrication and operating temperatures in this unit, the proper lubricants must be used. Correct oil levels must be maintained. All lubricants should be backed by the reputation of a well-known supplier. If you want to use a lubricant not specified below, please contact your local International Truck Dealer.

svcproc.title: RECOMMENDED LUBRICANTS
svcproc.para: The lubricants listed below are recommended for use in code 13MAG and 13MAH transmissions in the order of preference.
